definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Did you spray them with the hose?
sentences.chinese: 你用水龙带喷他们水了吗？

sentences.english: The fireman reeled the hosepipe out.
Have you got ready the fire hose and fire equipment for emergency ?
sentences.chinese: 你们的救火水龙带和救火设备是否预备好可紧急使用？

sentences.english: The fireman trained their hoses on the burning building.
sentences.chinese: 消防队员把水龙带对准燃烧的建筑物。

sentences.english: The sailors sluiced the deck with hoses.
sentences.chinese: 水手们用水龙带冲洗甲板。

sentences.english: Kath put a stop to that, but now he was washing his clothes with the hose.
sentences.chinese: 凯思阻止了他，可现在他又用水龙带洗衣服。

sentences.english: They reeled the hosepipe in rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 他们迅速将水龙带卷好。

sentences.english: The truck left the loading dock with hoses still attached.
sentences.chinese: 卡车驶离装货月台时塑料水龙带还连在上面。

sentences.english: The firemen unwrapped their hoses and began dousing the scorched grain silos.
sentences.chinese: 消防员展开水龙带，开始冲着烧焦的谷仓喷水。

sentences.english: On the ladder was a fireman with a fire hose.
sentences.chinese: 梯子上有个拿着灭火水龙带的消防队员。

sentences.english: Scores of hoses played on the flames.
sentences.chinese: 几十根水龙带向火喷水。

sentences.english: I’m not sure there was even a place to attach their fire hoses.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是否还有可以接上灭火水龙带的地方。

sentences.english: The firemen played  their hoses on the burning building at the street corner.
sentences.chinese: 消防队员将水龙带对着街角燃烧的大楼喷射。
